go_data.justification: CUL4A is part of the CRL4(DDB2) ligase complex, which is involved in ubiquitination.
CUL4A is a component of the CRL4(DDB2) complex, which participates in the ubiquitination process.
The CRL4(DDB2) complex, containing CUL4A, is involved in recognizing DNA damage in chromatin, implying a nuclear location.
